result.name: central-health-and-safety-project
result.notes: This is the legacy system used to capture Health and Safety events within the MoD. It was run by DASA and has now been replaced by ISIS. The data is maintained as an archive by DASA for Statistical purposed. This is a dormant system the data will not be amended.

organization.name: ministry-of-defence
organization.title: Ministry of Defence
organization.description:
We protect the security, independence and interests of our country at home and abroad. We work with our allies and partners whenever possible. Our aim is to ensure that the armed forces have the training, equipment and support necessary for their work, and that we keep within budget.

MOD is a ministerial department, supported by 28 agencies and public bodies.

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/ministry-of-defence

result.title: Central Health and Safety Project

extras.value: This Information Asset has not been published because it contains significant amounts of personal/medical data and it's publication would breach the Data Protection Act. This Information Asset is used to produce Official and National Statistics which provide summaries of the information for further analysis.
